alert.note: Alert for Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 13 at 8:37PM CST until December 13 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... North central Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Central West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 930 PM CST. * At 837 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Swartz, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Goodwill around 910 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Forest, Collinston, Mer Rouge, Pioneer and Oak Ridge. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
